scripts.ci:publish: pnpm publish -r && changeset tag && git push --follow-tags
scripts.docker:build: dotenv -e ./apps/client/.env -c -- docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml build
scripts.docker:dev: pnpm docker:stop && dotenv -e ./apps/client/.env -c -- docker compose up --build -d && pnpm docker:init && pnpm dev
scripts.docker:prod: pnpm docker:stop && dotenv -e ./apps/client/.env -c -- docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up --build -d && pnpm docker:init
scripts.docker:stop: dotenv -e ./apps/client/.env -c -- docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml down
